entries.s_8f1601d8: The officer, Col. Axfow, that I'm guarding. He's a bit long on fear of being attacked and short on common sense.
entries.s_2fd6a00b: Back away, citizen. Trust me. I'm trying to protect you as much as my charge. I can't say with certainty how he will react to any given situation, so it's best to just stay back.
entries.do_not_edit: The English version of this file (greeter_kor_vella_bodyguard.stf) is automatically generated by the SwgConversationEditor.
